instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fans on max, Th1H Right Fin Stack
threads.message:
Replaced HDD on that MBP and during data transfer fans turn on max.
Did ASD and its showing Th1H - SMC IO failed.

Checked <CHIP>U5550</CHIP> are and all looks clean.
<CHIP>U5550</CHIP>/1 = 3V

Resistance on <RESISTOR>R5550</RESISTOR>, <RESISTOR>R5551</RESISTOR> and <RESISTOR>R5552</RESISTOR> is correct.

Any idea?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fans on max, Th1H Right Fin Stack
threads.message: If there is SMC IO error then there must be more sensors failing. Let ASD continue on error.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fans on max, Th1H Right Fin Stack
threads.message:
No Title

Its showing just one error.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fans on max, Th1H Right Fin Stack
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fans on max, Th1H Right Fin Stack
threads.message: <TRANSISTOR>Q5501</TRANSISTOR> replaced and all works fine :) SOLVED
